scripts.clean: rimraf temp/ && rimraf download/ && rimraf test-results/
scripts.pretest: npm run webdriver-update && npm run clean && npm run tsc
scripts.test:local: cp config/wm-automation-config-local.json config/config.json && npm run pretest && protractor temp/conf.js
scripts.test:dev: cp config/wm-automation-config-dev.json config/config.json && npm run pretest && protractor temp/conf.js
scripts.test:prod: cp config/wm-automation-config-prod.json config/config.json && npm run pretest && protractor temp/conf.js
